info.title: iManage Insight Plus
info.description: iManage Insight Plus connector empowers users to manage their organization's knowledge assets, making sure all files are secure within the iManage Work ecosystem.

post.summary: Get curation properties of a document
post.description: Gets curation properties of a document.

documentId.title: Document ID
documentId.description: Specifies the ID of the document. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!453.1'.

latest.title: Latest
latest.description: Specifies to get the latest version of the document.

is_latest.title: Is Latest
is_latest.description: Indicates if this is the latest version of the document.

latest.title: Latest Version
latest.description: Indicates the latest version number of the document.

full_file_name.title: Full File Name
full_file_name.description: Indicates the full file name of the document. Includes the file name extension.

basic_properties.title: Basic Document Properties
basic_properties.description: Indicates an embeddable '<span>' element that contains basic document properties.

document_url.title: Document URL
document_url.description: Indicates the sharable link for the document.

post.summary: Set curation properties on a document
post.description: Sets curation properties on a document.

documentId.title: Document ID
documentId.description: Specifies the ID of the document. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!453.1'.

approver.title: Approvers
approver.description: Specifies the SSIDs of one or more approvers for the document. Multiple values must be a semicolon-separated list.

drafting_notes.title: Drafting Notes
drafting_notes.description: Specifies notes or usage instructions for the document. Maximum 16,384 bytes.

is_maintained.title: Is Maintained
is_maintained.description: Specifies if the document is actively maintained.

knowledge_owner.title: Knowledge Owners
knowledge_owner.description: Specifies the SSIDs of one or more owners responsible for maintaining the document. Multiple values must be a semicolon-separated list.

knowledge_type.title: Knowledge Types
knowledge_type.description: Specifies one or more knowledge types for the document. Custom values entered must be SSIDs. Multiple values must be a semicolon-separated list.

language.title: Languages
language.description: Specifies one or more languages for the document (in ISO 639-2/T format). Custom values entered must be language codes. Multiple values must be a semicolon-separated list.

last_review_date.title: Last Review Date
last_review_date.description: Specifies the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the document was last reviewed.

mini_summary.title: Summary
mini_summary.description: Specifies summary information about the document. Maximum 4096 bytes.

next_review_date.title: Next Review Date
next_review_date.description: Specifies the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the document is next due for review.

other_noteworthy.title: Other Noteworthy
other_noteworthy.description: Specifies other notes related to the document. Maximum 4096 bytes.

state.title: State
state.description: Specifies the current state of the document.

submit_date.title: Submit Date
submit_date.description: Specifies the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the document was submitted.

taxonomy1.title: Taxonomy1
taxonomy1.description: Specifies one or more SSIDs of taxonomy1 values. Multiple values must be a semicolon-separated list.

taxonomy2.title: Taxonomy2
taxonomy2.description: Specifies one or more SSIDs of taxonomy2 values. Multiple values must be a semicolon-separated list.

taxonomy3.title: Taxonomy3
taxonomy3.description: Specifies one or more SSIDs of taxonomy3 values. Multiple values must be a semicolon-separated list.

taxonomy4.title: Taxonomy4
taxonomy4.description: Specifies one or more SSIDs of taxonomy4 values. Multiple values must be a semicolon-separated list.

taxonomy5.title: Taxonomy5
taxonomy5.description: Specifies one or more SSIDs of taxonomy5 values. Multiple values must be a semicolon-separated list.

submitter.title: Submitted By
submitter.description: Specifies SSID for the submitter of the document.

submitted_doc_id.title: Submitted Document ID
submitted_doc_id.description: Specifies the source ID of the submitted document. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!453.1'.

get.description: Gets language options for the knowledge document.
Gets knowledge types for the library.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the library.

ssid.title: Created By
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID of the user who created the knowledge type.

create_date.title: Creation Date
create_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the knowledge type was created.

description.title: Description
description.description: Indicates the description of the knowledge type.

ssid.title: Edited By
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID of the user who last edited the knowledge type.

edit_date.title: Edit Date
edit_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the knowledge type was last edited.

enabled.title: Is Enabled
enabled.description: Indicates if the knowledge type is enabled.

id.title: ID
id.description: Indicates the identifying alias of the knowledge type.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID of the knowledge type.

get.description: Gets the curation configuration for the specified library, such as the knowledge administrators and folders.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the library for which curation configuration is returned.

knowledge_admins.title: Knowledge Administrators
knowledge_admins.description: Indicates one or more knowledge administrators.

knowledge_library_id.title: Knowledge Library ID
knowledge_library_id.description: Indicates the ID of the knowledge library corresponding to the specified library.

get.description: Gets a list of libraries to which the user has access.

id.title: Library ID
id.description: Indicates the name of the library.

display_name.title: Library Name
display_name.description: Indicates the display name of the library.

type.title: Library Type
type.description: Indicates the type of the library. Possible values are 'worksite' or 'linksite'.

is_hidden.title: Is Hidden Library
is_hidden.description: Indicates if the library is hidden.

get.description: Gets extended or curation property IDs based on a specified property namespace and type.

parameters.name: property_namespace
parameters.description: Specifies the property namespace to which the search is limited.

parameters.name: property_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of property IDs to return.

id.title: ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the property.

display_name.title: Display Name
display_name.description: Indicates the display name of the property.

post.description: Searches for curation taxonomy node values matching the specified search criteria.

libraryId.title: Library ID
libraryId.description: Specifies the ID of the library on which to perform the search.

taxonomyProperty.title: Taxonomy Property
taxonomyProperty.description: Specifies the taxonomy property for which to search node values.

id.title: ID
id.description: Specifies the display identifier of the taxonomy node value. This search is not case-sensitive. Partial matches are not supported.

query.title: Query
query.description: Specifies a query for matching taxonomy node values using a wildcard (*) search, providing partial matches for the display identifier or description.

enabled_state.title: Node State
enabled_state.description: Specifies to return only taxonomy node values that are enabled or disabled or both.

include_path.title: Include Path
include_path.description: Specifies to return the full path to the matching node value. A path is an ordered list beginning with the top-level node in the taxonomy and then all nodes through to the matching node's immediate parent.

children_of_ssid.title: Ancestor Node SSID
children_of_ssid.description: Specifies the unique, system-generated ID of the taxonomy node to limit the search to.

immediate_children_only.title: Immediate Children Only
immediate_children_only.description: Specifies to limit the search results to direct descendants of the taxonomy node specified by 'Ancestor Node SSID'. Search can be limited to the root level of the taxonomy by specifying an empty string for 'Ancestor Node SSID' wrapped in single or double quotes.

topMatchingResult.title: Top Matching Node
topMatchingResult.description: Indicates the top matching node of search results.

created_by.title: Created By
created_by.description: Indicates the user who created the top matching node value.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the user who created the top matching node value.

create_date.title: Create Date
create_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the top matching node value was created.

description.title: Description
description.description: Indicates the description of the top matching node value.

edited_by.title: Edited By
edited_by.description: Indicates the user who last edited the top matching node value.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the user who last edited the top matching node value.

edit_date.title: Edit Date
edit_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the top matching node value was last edited.

enabled.title: Is Enabled
enabled.description: Indicates if the top matching node value is enabled.

id.title: ID
id.description: Indicates the display identifier for the top matching node value.

parent.title: Parent
parent.description: Indicates the immediate parent node of the top matching node value.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the immediate parent node of the top matching node value.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the top matching node value.

path.title: Path
path.description: Indicates the full path to the top matching node value. A path is an ordered list beginning with the top-level node in the taxonomy and then all nodes through to the matching node's immediate parent.

id.title: Each ID
id.description: Indicates the display identifier for a node value in the path of the top matching node.

ssid.title: Each SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for a node value in the path of the top matching node.

results.title: Curation Taxonomy Search Results
results.description: Indicates one or more curation taxonomy node values matching the search.

all_taxonomy_ssids.title: All Taxonomy Node SSIDs
all_taxonomy_ssids.description: Indicates a list of all taxonomy node SSIDs, concatenated as a string and separated by semicolons.

submit_date.title: Submit Date
submit_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the document was submitted.

last_review_date.title: Last Review Date
last_review_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the document was last reviewed.

next_review_date.title: Next Review Date
next_review_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the document is next due for review.

is_maintained.title: Is Maintained
is_maintained.description: Indicates if the content is actively maintained.

drafting_notes.title: Drafting Notes
drafting_notes.description: Indicates notes or usage instructions for the document.

mini_summary.title: Summary
mini_summary.description: Indicates summary information about the document.

taxonomy1.description: Indicates one or more node values for taxonomy1.

items.description: Indicates each node value for taxonomy1.

enabled.title: Enabled

id.title: ID

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the taxonomy1 node value.

description.title: Description

taxonomy4.description: Indicates one or more node values for taxonomy4.

items.description: Indicates each node value for taxonomy4.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Indicates if the taxonomy4 node value is enabled.

id.description: Indicates the display identifier of the taxonomy4 node value.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the taxonomy4 node value.

description.description: Indicates the description of the taxonomy4 node value.

taxonomy5.description: Indicates one or more node values for taxonomy5.

items.description: Indicates each node value for taxonomy5.

enabled.description: Indicates if the taxonomy5 node value is enabled.

id.description: Indicates the display identifier of the taxonomy5 node value.

description.description: Indicates the description of the taxonomy5 node value.

all_taxonomy1_ssids.title: All Taxonomy1 SSIDs
all_taxonomy1_ssids.description: Indicates a list of all taxonomy1 SSIDs, concatenated as a string and separated by semicolons.

all_taxonomy2_ssids.title: All Taxonomy2 SSIDs
all_taxonomy2_ssids.description: Indicates a list of all taxonomy2 SSIDs, concatenated as a string and separated by semicolons.

all_taxonomy3_ssids.title: All Taxonomy3 SSIDs
all_taxonomy3_ssids.description: Indicates a list of all taxonomy3 SSIDs, concatenated as a string and separated by semicolons.

all_taxonomy4_ssids.title: All Taxonomy4 SSIDs
all_taxonomy4_ssids.description: Indicates a list of all taxonomy4 SSIDs, concatenated as a string and separated by semicolons.

all_taxonomy5_ssids.title: All Taxonomy5 SSIDs
all_taxonomy5_ssids.description: Indicates a list of all taxonomy5 SSIDs, concatenated as a string and separated by semicolons.

knowledge_type.title: Knowledge Types
knowledge_type.description: Indicates one or more knowledge types of the document.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Indicates if the knowledge type value is enabled.

description.title: Description
description.description: Indicates the description of the knowledge type value.

id.title: ID
id.description: Indicates the display identifier of the knowledge type value.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the knowledge type value.

all_knowledge_type_ssids.title: All Knowledge Type SSIDs
all_knowledge_type_ssids.description: Indicates a list of all knowledge_type SSIDs, concatenated as a string and separated by semicolons.

approver.title: Approvers
approver.description: Indicates one or more approvers of the document.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Indicates if the approver is enabled.

is_external.title: External
is_external.description: Indicates the approver is an external user.

id.title: User ID
id.description: Indicates the user ID of the approver.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the approver.

all_approver_ssids.title: All Approver SSIDs
all_approver_ssids.description: Indicates a list of all approver SSIDs, concatenated as a string and separated by semicolons.

knowledge_owner.title: Knowledge Owners
knowledge_owner.description: Indicates one or more owners responsible for maintaining the document.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Indicates if the knowledge owner is enabled.

is_external.title: External
is_external.description: Indicates if the knowledge owner is an external user.

id.title: User ID
id.description: Indicates the user ID of the knowledge owner.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the knowledge owner.

all_knowledge_owner_ssids.title: All Knowledge Owner SSIDs
all_knowledge_owner_ssids.description: Indicates a list of all knowledge_owner SSIDs, concatenated as a string and separated by semicolons.

submitter.title: Submitter
submitter.description: Indicates the submitter of the document.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Indicates if the submitter is enabled.

is_external.title: External
is_external.description: Indicates if the submitter is an external user.

id.title: User ID
id.description: Indicates the user ID of the submitter.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the submitter.

state.title: State
state.description: Indicates the current state of the document. Possible states are 'IN_DRAFT', 'SUBMITTED', 'REJECTED', 'PUBLISHED', 'RETIRED', 'UNPUBLISHED'.

language.title: Languages
language.description: Indicates one or more languages of the document (in ISO 639-2/T format).

items.title: Each Language
items.description: Indicates each language of the document (in ISO 639-2/T format).

all_languages.title: All Languages
all_languages.description: Indicates a list of all languages of the document, concatenated as a string and separated by semicolons.

other_noteworthy.title: Other Noteworthy
other_noteworthy.description: Indicates other notes related to the document.

submitted_doc_id.title: Submitted Document ID
submitted_doc_id.description: Indicates the source ID of the submitted document.

curation_submitted.title: Submitted Documents Folder ID
curation_submitted.description: Indicates the ID of the folder for submitted documents.

curation_indraft.title: In-draft Documents Folder ID
curation_indraft.description: Indicates the ID of the folder for in-draft documents.

curation_published.title: Published Documents Folder ID
curation_published.description: Indicates the ID of the folder for published documents.

curation_rejected.title: Rejected Documents Folder ID
curation_rejected.description: Indicates the ID of the folder for rejected documents.

curation_retired.title: Retired Documents Folder ID
curation_retired.description: Indicates the ID of the folder for retired documents.

curation_unpublished.title: Un-published Documents Folder ID
curation_unpublished.description: Indicates the ID of the folder for un-published documents.

id.title: ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the knowledge administrator.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicates the type of the knowledge administrator. Possible values are 'USER' or 'GROUP'.

created_by.title: Created By
created_by.description: Indicates the user who created the node value.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the user who created the node value.

create_date.title: Create Date
create_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the node value was created.

description.title: Description
description.description: Indicates the description of the node value.

edited_by.title: Edited By
edited_by.description: Indicates the user who last edited the node value.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the user who last edited the node value.

edit_date.title: Edit Date
edit_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the node value was last edited.

enabled.title: Is Enabled
enabled.description: Indicates if the node value is enabled.

id.title: ID
id.description: Indicates the display identifier for the node value.

parent.title: Parent
parent.description: Indicates the immediate parent node of this node value.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the immediate parent's node.

ssid.title: SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for the node value.

path.title: Path
path.description: Indicates the full path to the node value. A path is an ordered list beginning with the top-level node in the taxonomy and then all nodes through to the matching node's immediate parent.

id.title: Each ID
id.description: Indicates the display identifier for a node value in the path.

ssid.title: Each SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID for a node value in the path.

SetCurationPropertiesForDocumentResponse.description: Set curation properties for document response body.
